verses.verse: A Song<WH7892> of degrees.<WH4609> Blessed<WH835> is every one<WH3605> that feareth<WH3373> the LORD;<WH3068> that walketh<WH1980> in his ways.<WH1870>
For <WH3588> thou shalt eat<WH398> the labor<WH3018> of thine hands:<WH3709> happy<WH835> shalt thou be, and it shall be well<WH2896> with thee.
Thy wife<WH802> shall be as a fruitful<WH6509> vine<WH1612> by the sides<WH3411> of thine house:<WH1004> thy children<WH1121> like olive<WH2132> plants<WH8363> round about<WH5439> thy table.<WH7979>
Behold, <WH2009> that<WH3588> thus<WH3651> shall the man<WH1397> be blessed<WH1288> that feareth<WH3373> the LORD.<WH3068>
The LORD<WH3068> shall bless<WH1288> thee out of Zion:<WH4480> <WH6726> and thou shalt see<WH7200> the good<WH2898> of Jerusalem<WH3389> all<WH3605> the days<WH3117> of thy life.<WH2416>
Yea, thou shalt see<WH7200> thy children's<WH1121> children,<WH1121> and peace<WH7965> upon<WH5921> Israel.<WH3478>
